mapper.sql: RETIREMENT_ID, COMPANY_ID,AVM_TRX_ID,AVM_TRX_ID_BAST,BAST_DOC_NO, BRANCH_ID,(case when BRANCH_ID = -1 then 'HEADOFFICE' else (SELECT SUBSTR (ORGANIZATION_CODE, -5) as branch_code from WOS_ORGANIZATIONS where ORGANIZATION_ID = BRANCH_ID and rownum = 1) end )BRANCH_CODE,(case when BRANCH_ID = -1 then 'Head Office' else (SELECT ORGANIZATION_NAME from WOS_ORGANIZATIONS where ORGANIZATION_ID = BRANCH_ID and rownum = 1) end )BRANCH_NAME, REQUEST_NO,REQUEST_DATE,RETIREMENT_TYPE_ID,RETIREMENT_TYPE_CODE,(select DESCRIPTION from BSE_LOOKUP_DEPENDENTS where LOOKUP_ID = RETIREMENT_TYPE_ID and DETAIL_CODE = RETIREMENT_TYPE_CODE) RETIREMENT_TYPE, RECIPIENT,QUOTATION_PRICE,NOTES,STATUS_ID,STATUS_CODE,(select DESCRIPTION from BSE_LOOKUP_DEPENDENTS where LOOKUP_ID = STATUS_ID and DETAIL_CODE = STATUS_CODE) status, BAST_STATUS_ID,BAST_STATUS_CODE,(select DESCRIPTION from BSE_LOOKUP_DEPENDENTS where LOOKUP_ID = BAST_STATUS_ID and DETAIL_CODE = BAST_STATUS_CODE) BAST_STATUS, RV_NUMBER, HD.CREATED_BY, HD.CREATION_DATE, HD.LAST_UPDATE_BY, HD.LAST_UPDATE_DATE
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'false' as QUERYID,
from SOC_RETIREMENT_HDR HD
order by ${orderByClause}

select 'false' as QUERYID,
FROM SOC_RETIREMENT_HDR HD LEFT JOIN SAM_USERS U ON U.USER_ID = HD.LAST_UPDATE_BY where AVM_TRX_ID = #{avmTrxIdString,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ROWNUM = 1

select 'false' as QUERYID,
FROM SOC_RETIREMENT_HDR HD LEFT JOIN SAM_USERS U ON U.USER_ID = HD.LAST_UPDATE_BY where AVM_TRX_ID_BAST = #{avmTrxIdBastString,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ROWNUM = 1
mapper.insert:
select SOC_RETIREMENT_HDR_S.nextVal from dual
insert into SOC_RETIREMENT_HDR (RETIREMENT_ID,AVM_TRX_ID, REQUEST_NO, BAST_DOC_NO, REQUEST_DATE,BRANCH_ID,COMPANY_ID,RETIREMENT_TYPE_ID,RETIREMENT_TYPE_CODE,RECIPIENT,QUOTATION_PRICE,NOTES,STATUS_ID,STATUS_CODE, CREATED_BY, CREATION_DATE, LAST_UPDATE_BY, ebs_flag, LAST_UPDATE_DATE) values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{avmTrxIdString,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{requestNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bastDocNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{requestDate,jdbcType=DATE},#{branchId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{companyId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{retirementTypeId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{retirementTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{recipient,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{quotationPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{notes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{statusId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{statusCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastUpdateBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{ebsFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update SOC_RETIREMENT_HDR set REQUEST_NO = #{requestNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AVM_TRX_ID = #{avmTrxIdString,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REQUEST_DATE = #{requestDate,jdbcType=DATE}, RETIREMENT_TYPE_ID = #{retirementTypeId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RETIREMENT_TYPE_CODE = #{retirementTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS_ID = #{statusId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STATUS_CODE = #{statusCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RECIPIENT = #{recipient,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QUOTATION_PRICE = #{quotationPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, NOTES = #{notes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BAST_STATUS_ID = #{bastStatusId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, BAST_STATUS_CODE = #{bastStatusCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AVM_TRX_ID_BAST = #{avmTrxIdBastString,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAST_UPDATE_BY = #{lastUpdateBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LAST_UPDATE_DATE = #{lastUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where RETIREMENT_ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update SOC_RETIREMENT_HDR set BAST_DOC_NO = #{bastDocNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REQUEST_NO = #{requestNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AVM_TRX_ID = #{avmTrxIdString,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REQUEST_DATE = #{requestDate,jdbcType=DATE}, RETIREMENT_TYPE_ID = #{retirementTypeId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RETIREMENT_TYPE_CODE = #{retirementTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS_ID = #{statusId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STATUS_CODE = #{statusCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RECIPIENT = #{recipient,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QUOTATION_PRICE = #{quotationPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, NOTES = #{notes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BAST_STATUS_ID = #{bastStatusId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, BAST_STATUS_CODE = #{bastStatusCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AVM_TRX_ID_BAST = #{avmTrxIdBastString,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAST_UPDATE_BY = #{lastUpdateBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LAST_UPDATE_DATE = #{lastUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where RETIREMENT_ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select request_no from(select request_no from SOC_RETIREMENT_HDR order by retirement_id desc) where rownum =1
select bast_doc_no from(select bast_doc_no from SOC_RETIREMENT_HDR where bast_doc_no is not null order by retirement_id desc) where rownum =1
SELECT SUBSTR(branch_code, 0, 3) AS BRANCH_CODE FROM wos_organization_versions WHERE organization_id = #{branchId, jdbcType=DECIMAL} and TRUNC (SYSDATE) BETWEEN date_from AND date_to
